Thin-man

A Rails restful-ajax library that makes web apps lively while keeping all the logic on the server.

View the Project on GitHub edraut/thin-man

  • Download ZIP File
  • Download TAR Ball
  • View On GitHub

Extending ThinMan

ThinMan uses John Resig's Javascript Class extension. You can subclass any of the ThinMan classes and extend the behavior.

var AjaxBlinkLink = AjaxLinkSubmission.extend({
  ajaxSuccess: function(data,textStatus,jqXHR) {
    this._super(data,textStatus,jqXHR);
    myLibrary.blinkThis($(this.jq_obj));
  }
});

Full documentation on the methods and attributes to use when extending can be written if there is demand. Add an issue in the ThinMan wiki and @mention edraut.
